data.DialogueExample1: {"c2array":true,"size":[3,7,1],"data":[[["Hi darling."],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["Hi prince charming!"],[2],["Princess"],[""],[""],[1],[""]],[["Hmm, sorry.{wait:400}.{wait:400}.{wait:400} I think I mistook you for someone else!"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]]}
data.DialogueExample2: {"c2array":true,"size":[3,7,1],"data":[[["Hello dear friend.{pause} Might you be interested in perusing my fine wares?"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["Not a chance, your prices are too damn high!"],[2],["Portrait1"],[""],[""],[1],[""]],[[".{wait:500}.{wait:500}.{pause}\n\nThis saddens me greatly!"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]]}
data.ForkExample: {"c2array":true,"size":[3,7,1],"data":[[["Simple fork to test the amount of gold.\nCurrent gold : {#gold}{pause}{fork:{#gold}>=50,2,3}"],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["You have more or at least 50 gold, congrats!{pause}{end}"],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["You have less than 50 gold, you poor bastard... D:"],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]]}
data.ChoiceExample1: {"c2array":true,"size":[5,7,1],"data":[[["Good day, would you like to stay at our inn? It's only 50GP! (You currently have {#gold}GP){pause}{choice:Yes::2,No::3}"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["{fork:{#gold}>=50,4,5}"],[0],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["Fair enough, you won't find any better place than this one though!{pause}{end}"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["{setvalue:gold,50,-}Thank you, I hope you'll enjoy your stay!{pause}{end}"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]],[["I'm sorry, but it seems you don't have enough gold!"],[1],["Portrait2"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]]}
data.ChoiceExample2: {"c2array":true,"size":[1,7,1],"data":[[["{setdelay:0}-Simple choice example-{resetdelay}\nSelect the dialogue you want to run.{pause}{choice:ChoiceExample1::ChoiceExample1,DialogueExample1::DialogueExample1,DialogueExample2::DialogueExample2,ForkExample::ForkExample,MusicExample::MusicExample}"],[0],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]]}
